ygData.subject: Re: Hey John!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... always ... Yeah tell me about it, i was almost level 16 and during the time that my pc was freaking out i lost it all and dropped to 15 again....sigh ...
ygData.messageBody:
>Frosty is level 19, yup. Everytime i gain a bit of exp with him, I
always
> end up dying and losing it all. I'm just under a bubb with him now.
>
Yeah tell me about it, i was almost level 16 and during the time that my pc
was freaking out i lost it all and dropped to 15 again....sigh


>Yeah, that sounds like a great plan. Too bad you get on *so* late
at night
> though! If you wouldn't mind, I'll bring an enchantress friend along.
> She's going to be Frizzan's wife eventually. Hehe ;) She was level 21
> yesterday, but with the exp formula, a few levels is just a percentage or
> two differnce with split.
>
OOOoooo gettting married are you? You have to invite me to the
wedding...yeah i dont mind grouping up witha level 21 so long as i hit
level 16 first, shouldnt take long.


>You might've when i was zoning or something.. Because i did catch
you on
> once or twice, bbut was always travelling, and you know how that goes.
>
Yeah that may have been the case, sorry again.



>Nooooo problem about the armor. Good friends always come before the
just
> met friends. I'd do the same thing :)
>
I'm Looking forward to playing with you =)

Talk to you later.





John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745
